attributes.action: Ensure that all classes are taken by qualified teachers and not support staff, or cover supervisors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many teachers are concerned about the increasing use of cover supervisors in classrooms across the country. 

We are deeply concerned about this de-professionalisation of teaching, and believe strongly that only qualified teachers should take classes. 

Cover supervisors and support staff (even admin staff in rare cases) have been 'teaching' our children, and this cannot continue. We care too much about teaching to allow this to go on.
